post.body: so am I. So am I.
I'll email you the link. :)
Yay! You're on twitter!!! And since when is me being a dork news?? :)
Yay! Thanks!!!! ♫ ♫ ♫ Fa la la la la la la la la ♫ ♫ ♫
I'm jealous! How did you do the notes!?
When I get it, we should have a marathon!!! (When I'm feeling better!)
I heard "The Happening" was awful! It was scary!?! Really?
hi. :)
why are you wary of Betty Buckley? LOL Is this in reference to her theatrical career or her awful turn in "The Happening?"
I have been loaded up on cold meds, so I can't get to sleep at a decent hour. Why not tweet??
Sure did! They were awesome!!
Oh no!!!!!
uh, my last message was meant for you. Duh.
Didn't you say you were a fan of "The Guild?!"
that I ACTUALLY read it back then...lol
I was supposed to have read it Senior Year in HS...I remember reading it, but after reading it again, I don't think ...
haha Crikey!
you are cracking me up lately!!! hahahaha I love it!!!!
I miss you.
I have a Friends quote for you but it's too long. Boo.
but, however, it's anyman's choice to do what they want to their own personal temple. So don't let me deter you if you have fun.
think of it this way - anything foreign that you inhale into your body is pretty much not a good thing. :)
according to the CDC, cloves may actually cause a greater threat than normal cigs as they produce 2x as much nicotine and CO
there is 60-70percent tabacco in cloves, with only 30-40 of that made of cloves...
not sure if that's "it" but that is a major factor
Uh, I can easily tell you what you are doing to your body: turning your lungs BLACK! Didn't you see that pic in school?
You are like a WikiRobin (or WikiHush?) I love it!
so you are looking it up!? Pray tell, why?
Kretek? What's that?
Thank you, Brad Pitt. (I think you are missing an expletive.)
http://twitpic.com/uhzc - So. Jealous. :)
is sick again!?! How on earth is this possible!? I just got better!!!
watching "twilight" online...muhahahaha.
How can I decide what's right When you're clouding up my mind?
is anxious...why?
Oh. My. God. Henry Cavill is DELICIOUS!
totally had fun with a hijacked webcam over on facebook...
fa la la la la la la la
also...got my free Zagat book today! $16 value for FREE just because I told them which restaurants I liked...nice.
can't find Haunkkah candles ANYWHERE!?
meh
they killed off Batman? Don't read the comics, but it's in the news...and this is more important than Mumbai??
(I have the flu...)
nibbled at dinner (felt I had to try) but feeling nauseous. Oh lovely... :(
just found out horrible arts related news from the Bay...though, it's not public until Monday, so I can't say a WORD! Ugh!!
is wishing everyone the HAPPIEST of Happy Thanksgivings!!
thought she was feeling slightly better, but now she isn't so sure... She sounds like a Yeti.
just got her copy of "tales of beedle the bard" in the mail!! I may feel like poop, but this just made me happier!
Just bought "The 10th Kingdom" on Amazon for $7!!! I'm so stoked. I loved that miniseries!
I really wish I had health insurance right now!!! :( I'm hacking up a lung over here...
It's finally feeling like winter here in NorCal...
Okay, my keyboard is fixed...yay!
This oan.gniyonsssi
test tset
as aweird keyboard thing i o ngnog owH
watching "The Shop Around The Corner." My favorite musical is based on this movie!! Such a classic!
has a nasty cough...boo.
watching Wonderfalls...so cute! Too bad it was canceled 4 years ago!
I need to get sleep
nevermind, not finding much to support COLD hives with the inhaler, just hives...but hmm...
INSANE!
okay, woah. now finding that my INHALER may be causing my COLD HIVES (I've had them for years...)
Thank goodness for webmd and google - I can google symptoms!
wow...just found out (online) that I have cold uticaria. Yep. I get hives when it's too cold - whether it's the weather, water, etc.
still up...why can't I fall asleep at a normal hour?
Just found Twitterfox! Yay!
currently looking for the Season 15 application for Amazing Race...any clue where to find it? A friend and I are going to apply!
is currently fascinated with researching film studios and the productions filmed there. Looking at Pinewood currently...fascinating!
Thinks Catherine and Heathcliff are two of the most disparaging characters she's ever read...thank GOD for Elizabeth and Darcy...
Sometimes Hollywood just doesn't understand...
They better not mess up "New Moon."
How do you make realistic changes for the Quileutes transforming into wolves without a substantial budget!?!?!!?
so Catherine Hardwicke isn't returning for "New Moon." Rumor has it Summit doesn't want to increase the budget. Uh, what the hell?
is excited about the winners of "The Amazing Race!"
Feeling slightly better...thank GOD! Still staying in for one more day...
guh, how is it I always start to develop mini-crushes on UNAVAILABLE guys who go for the ITTY BITTY cute girls!?! Ughhhhh.
Finally realize who Felicia Day is!!! She used to be on Buffy and is the object of NPH's desire in "Dr. Horrible!" Duh. Took me long enough
need. to. stop. noshing. on. nerds. BAD! Candy = BAD!
I am devoid of all energy.
loves it that I can find what movies/tv shows my scripts for class are from...thank you youtube!
...and I was in AP English! I must have had something better to do... (than read P&P!?!?)
I think I just read bits and pieces here and there and supplemented it with Cliff's Notes back in the day...ahh, what a studious gal I was
stayed up until 3am...again...but this time I was productive and finished P&P! For thinking I read it in HS, I must have lied.
is feeling like a cookie...and there are none. Boo.
er, that one quote should have read 'I love that the aunts names are the names of MY grandmother and great aunt." duh.
Just because there's vodka in my freezer doesn't mean I need to drink it. Wait... yes it does.
I love that the aunts names on "pushing daisies" are the names of her grandmother and great aunt! lol
I'm learning I may have to eat MORE to actually LOSE. Ugh.
*sigh*
"would they see a poor boy? no siree. they'd find out they're so much more....to meeeee....."
wants to move to LA...at least it will get her out of Sac. Anyone know any cheap (or FREE) trainers in Sac in the meantime???
I. need. to. get. out. of. sacramento. LA. NY. I don't care! Get me there!
is wondering if I can say "balls" on Facebook ?
Sacramento is suffocating.
discussing the probability that "New Moon" will be poop with NJ. (Potentially firing an actor, new director, sloppy script...)
Mamma Mia is a Golden Globe nominee!?! Are you %&^$ing kidding me?
how do I attract money??
going to bed... zzzz. :)
Okay...I'm sayin' it here: I plan on losing a good 40 pounds over the next several months. I CAN DO IT! No more depressed Andrea!
set my alarm to wake up early to hit the gym. Let's see if that happens!
Trying not to be so depressed about my weight. I'm workin' on it. :(
blah. I still can't seem to lose weight. Trying something new tomorrow...pray.
took full advantage of the rainy day today and made the coolest gingerbread house!!!
...and apparently I'm not the only Wells Fargo user that this happened to today.
someone stole my cc# and tried to charge over $500 in Romania. Niiiice.
getting ready for Jeff's wedding and have no clue what to wear! I certainly have enough...
just thought of all of the fun Schumacher X-mas Shows she used to be a part of! So long ago!!!!
watching "Aladdin"...yeah, I'm cheesy.
Aww, "Proud of your Boy" is so sweet...
has a friend figuring out which Jonas Bro is the cutest. If I were 16, I'd go for the one that dropped Taylor Swift.
is trying to get some vocal coaching with Natalie Weiss...
thinking of going online with a vocal coach...thank God for Skype!
6th glass of wine...pacing myself...
6 glasses and going strong and only slightly buzzed...not sloppy
3rd glass of wine and the kids are just starting to open presents...the volume just increased exponentially...
Francisco! That's fun to say! Francisco... Frannncisco... Franciscooo...
preparing for a day filled with lots and lots of relatives. Where's the wine?
I really hate "the little drummer boy."
The light at the end of the tunnel may flicker at times, but it's always there.
...make that crying on the phone with AMEX.
getting ready to fight with AMEX. Ugh.
cleaning house for xmas and wondering where all of the cute forest animals are to help? Cinderella and Giselle had it so easy...
Uh, got a message from a Magic8Bot on Twitter. Creepy!
So I hear if you want a low-cal treat for the holidays you should go with a candy cane. Uh, can I make mine a candy cane martini?
Finally finished Season 1 of Heroes!! Wow! What a ride!
The best way to spread Christmas Cheer, is singing loud for all to hear...
even though its in the high 30's/ low 40's in sac, some think its shorts weather. makes me look retarded in my scarf and parka!
last msg was late for some reason...
if you are in line for a buffet, get off the damn cell phone! just sayin'...
http://twitpic.com/uerb - I still make the grooviest looking gingerbread houses!
